import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import "./TrainerMain.css"; import data from './data' function TrainerMain() { const params = useParams() const trainer = data.trainers.find((item)=> item._id === params.id) return (

{trainer.name}

{product.title}

Select Size

{ product.stockcount > 0 && (
) }
Status: {product.stockcount > 0 ? Instock : Out of stock}

PRODUCT DETAILS

Notes

Topnotes: {product.notes.Topnotes.join(', ')}

Middlenotes: {product.notes.Middlenotes.join(', ')}

Basenotes: {product.notes.Basenotes.join(', ')}

Description

{product.description}

Launch year

{product.launch}

Concentration

{product.concentration}

) } export default TrainerMain
